message: Let's split it evenly to start with!
I'll meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more
I'll give you a bit more, but you need to meet me in the middle
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need something in return
You're running out of time, I'm taking the lead
I'll give you most of it, but please don't leave me with nothing
Last chance, take it or leave it
